website_summaries.verdict: The great thing about this grill is that you can swing it over the fire while cooking and swing it out when your food is done and use the grate as a serving surface.
pros: Nice width on the grill itself as well as the grill irons
Great for leaving over a backyard fire pit
The stake can be left and the grill completely removed when not in use
cons: This grill works on a stake, which makes it a little harder to set in place and less stable than others
You may want to find a longer post

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camp grill
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camp grill. 1 negative to this item is the length of the post. We cooked with a large dutch oven and the grill started to tip after some time as it simply wasn't long enough to gain enough stability. We ended up using a log on the edge of the pit to add additional support while using heavier cooking pans. While using smaller cast iron pans and cooking food over the grill it stood perfectly straight and we didn't have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. T.

customer_reviews.title: Works great with modification
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for on my back yard firepit. The modification is in the reviews but TL;DR go get a piece of 3/4 black iron or galvanized pipe from the hardware store and drive it into the ground at your firepit. The rod will slide down into it and will turn easier. Other than that. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Works well with a little extra addition.
customer_reviews.text: Works great WITH the addition of a pipe or stanchion that allows the vertical support to slide into it so that it has 360° rotation. I repurposed a rusty shotgun barrel for the task, dropped a little Quick-Crete around the base, and violá, rock solid support and easy to swing from over the fire to outside the pit for wood stoking and food removal!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kelland

customer_reviews.title: Best little grill I’ve owned
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this grill. The main pic on this site shows grill upside down with no lip around the edge and I have read reviews where people wish it had one, just flip it over and it’s there. Before setup I drove a 3/4 inch piece of pipe in the ground and then put the rod in the pipe then I took a 2 foot piece of 1/2 inch rebar and put in the horizontal hole and it swivels and works wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Martin

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up, held up well on a weekend of campfire cooking.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cook on for a weekend trip to a campground with no electricity on our site. We made kabobs on tinfoil sheets onw night, and then eggs in a cast iron pan and bacon the next morning. The grate worked perfectly. Super easy to set up, spinning to access food wasn't a problem. Boupd recomend to others.

customer_reviews.title: Adjust a Grill 13570
customer_reviews.text: Simple, solid construction and finish. Have used just once with great results. As noted by others, the stake should be about 12" longer for more stable operation. We seasoned the grill with cooking oil, then baked at 350 before our first use, keeps the grill clean and free from sticking when cooking. Good product, packaged and shipped well. Would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: We have a lakeside fire pit and love to cook over a wood fire
customer_reviews.text: We have a lakeside fire pit and love to cook over a wood fire. The Adjust-A-Grill has worked extremely well for us. product_meta.title: Adjust-A-Grill Camping Grill - Makes Outdoor Cooking Easier and Safer
product_meta.description: An ingenious design that improves convenience and safety of grilling over an open flame, it doesn't get any easier than the Adjust-A-Grill. Simply pound in the stake, adjust the height, and rotate the grill to protect you from the flame and heat. Features: Reliable, safe and practical open fire grill Made of solid, heavy gauge steel Quick, easy set up Great temperature control Design allows food to cool before handling Comes with a 10 oz. canvas storage bag Warranted for life against manufacturing defects Item Specifications: Height: Stake: 24" Cooking Surface: 16" x 16" Weight: 9 lbs.
